
{{alias}}( [options] )
    Dsv parser constructor.

    Parameters
    ----------
    options: Object (optional)
        Constructor options.
    options.delimiter: string (optional)
        The string that will be used for delimiting the fields in each record.
    options.watermark: integer (optional)
        The number of rows to determine a delimiter from.
    options.threshhold: float (optional)
        The threshhold for delimiter guessing....
    options.bufferEncoding: string (optional)
        The encoding of the buffer that will be consumed.
    options.quoteCharacter: string (optional)
        The character that is used for escaping fields in the data.
    options.parseHeaders: boolean (optional)
        Whether or not the first record of the data is a header.

    Returns
    -------
    parser: Object
        Dsv Parser.

    parser.push: Function
        Pushes data to the parser.

    Examples
    --------
    > var string2buffer = require( '@stdlib/buffer/from-string' );
    > var parser = {{alias}}();
    > parser.push( string2buffer( 'a, b, c' ) );

    See Also
    --------
